description:
How will the European Union react to major challenges to its authority from its north and south? That's the question European leaders are having to grapple with again after another difficult week. Today Greece upped the stakes in its negotiations over a new bailout deal. It was due to make a 300-million-dollar repayment to the IMF by the end of the day. But in an unprecedented move it's chosen to roll this and other payments over till the end of the month. It's been seen as a political decision and an attempt to pile pressure on the country's creditors. Well in the last few minutes the Greek Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras has begun addressing the Greek parliament.

Well further north the British Prime Minister David Cameron is trying to drum up support for fundamental reform of the EU. He's promised an in-out referendum by the end of 2017. And he says that without change Britain might decide to leave the EU altogether. It won't be the first time British voters have been asked about the country's future in Europe. On June 6th, 1975, 40 years ago tomorrow, voters were also asked directly whether Britain should remain in what was then called the Common Market.

title: 希腊推迟还款，英国意欲退出（有声）

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

乔丁·斯帕克斯（英文：Jordin Sparks，1989年12月22日－），是一位美国歌手。在美国时间2007年5月23日，她成为了第六季的《美国偶像》胜出者。乔丁胜出时只有17岁，她亦是《美国偶像》六季以来最年轻的胜出者。稍后斯帕克斯会和经纪人公司 19 Entertainment 及唱片公司 RCA Records 签约。
这首《next to you 》是Jordin Sparks同名专辑中人气超旺的一首歌曲，她在处理歌曲时那种自然就溶入其中的投入度，并不是每个歌手身上都能找到的特质，这些在她处理一些中慢版的抒情歌时显得特别的突出，甚至有些超乎她年纪的成熟感。

Two o＇clock and I wish that I was sleeping
You＇re in my head like a song on the radio
All I know is I gotta get next to you
Yeah I gotta get next to you
Sitting here turning minutes in the hours
To find the nerve just to call you on the telephone
Cuz you don＇t know that I gotta get next to you
Maybe we＇re friends, maybe we＇re more
Maybe it＇s just my imagination
But I see you stare just a little too long
And it makes me start to wonder
So baby, call me crazy
But I think you feel it too
Maybe I, Maybe I, just gotta get next to you
Oh, oh

Asked around and I heard that you were talking

What a fool, I gotta get next to you
Oh, yeah
It＇s five in the morning and I can＇t go to sleep
Cuz I wish, yeah I wish you knew what you mean to me
Baby, let＇s get together and end this mystery
Maybe we＇re friends, maybe we＇re more
Maybe it＇s just my imagination
But I see you stare just a little too long
And it makes me start to wonder
So baby, call me crazy
But I think you feel it too
Maybe I, Maybe I, just gotta get next to you
Whatcha gotta say
Watcha gotta do

To wanna get next to you
